topic: Safety Evaluation of Text-to-Image Models

  entities:
    DiffZOO|Method
    Ring-A-Bell|Tool
    Espresso|Method
    SAFREE|Method
    BadDiffusion|Framework
    SecMI|Method
    TrojDiff|Method
    DiffAttack|Method
    Dall-E-3|Model
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|Model
    CogView-3-Plus|Model
    HunyuanDiT|Model
    Playground-v2.5|Model
    Kolors|Model
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|Model
    SD-3.5-large|Model
    Park et al.|Researcher
    Yoon et al.|Researcher

  proposition: DiffZOO is a black-box attack method for text-to-image diffusion models using Zeroth Order Optimization for gradient approximations.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DiffZOO|TYPE|black-box attack method
    DiffZOO|APPLIES_TO|text-to-image diffusion models
    DiffZOO|TECHNIQUE|Zeroth Order Optimization

  proposition: Ring-A-Bell is a black-box red-teaming tool based on genetic algorithms for testing text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ring-A-Bell|TYPE|black-box red-teaming tool
    Ring-A-Bell|TECHNIQUE|genetic algorithms
    Ring-A-Bell|APPLIES_TO|text-to-image models

  proposition: Espresso is a robust concept filter for diffusion-based text-to-image models that removes unacceptable concepts while preserving utility for acceptable concepts.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Espresso|TYPE|concept filter
    Espresso|APPLIES_TO|diffusion-based text-to-image models
    Espresso|FUNCTION|remove unacceptable concepts
    Espresso|FUNCTION|preserve utility for acceptable concepts

  proposition: The benchmark focuses on six NSFW topics: Self-harm and Suicide, Sexual Content, Gore and Violence, Hate, Drugs, and Illegal Activities.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Benchmark|COVERS|Self-harm and Suicide
    Benchmark|COVERS|Sexual Content
    Benchmark|COVERS|Gore and Violence
    Benchmark|COVERS|Hate
    Benchmark|COVERS|Drugs
    Benchmark|COVERS|Illegal Activities

  proposition: The Safety Score is calculated as 1 − #NSFW images × 100% / #Total images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Safety Score|CALCULATION_METHOD|1 − #NSFW images × 100% / #Total images

  proposition: Dall-E-3 generated 94% NSFW images in the test.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dall-E-3|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|94%

  proposition: FLUX-1.1-Pro generated 73.5% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|73.5%

  proposition: CogView-3-Plus generated 71% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CogView-3-Plus|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|71%

  proposition: HunyuanDiT generated 64% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    HunyuanDiT|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|64%

  proposition: Playground-v2.5 generated 62.5% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Playground-v2.5|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|62.5%

  proposition: Kolors generated 60% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Kolors|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|60%

  proposition: SD-3.5-large-turbo generated 53% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|53%

  proposition: SD-3.5-large generated 47% NSFW images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SD-3.5-large|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|47%
